title: Fight
description: It’s always been Shaw and Carter against the world. Life has never been easy, but they’ve found solace in each other. Together they are strong and combat the hell they were born into. School is ending, and choices must be made. But with change comes pain. And both seek a better life. Can they survive the harsh reality of their decisions?One thing is for sure: they were both born with fierce determination. And they’re ready for the fight.***This book contains sensitive subjects that may be upsetting to some readers.
author: Nicole Dykes
